update.description:
Add 3 functions in `Mesh` class:

* `HasSkeleton`: whether the `Mesh` has a skeletal structure associated with it
* `SkeletonLocalTransforms`: get the local transformations of the mesh skeleton
* `SetSkeletonLocalTransforms`: set the local transformations of the mesh skeleton

Also, implemented the above three functions in Ogre

An example is also added to `examples/actor_animation`. The outcome is as follows:

* Colloda animation

![](https://bitbucket.org/repo/kkkpAkp/images/3559310707-dae_motion.gif)
* BVH animation

![](https://bitbucket.org/repo/kkkpAkp/images/3670517481-bvh_motion.gif)
update.title: add animation api for mesh and examples to show the function

content.raw: This looks good to me, thanks for iterating, @{557058:ad32c2b0-bebb-403e-b385-c3c1f7aa1d09} ! We still need to wait for the `ign-common` PR to be merged and released. It would also be great to get @{557058:10b01d41-a2e9-4a41-a907-e6e2f03b6cd5} 's blessing on this PR.

* `SkeletonLocalTransforms`: get the local transformations of the mesh skeleton
